column5: By nature I am a bit of a worrier and as the main trip planner for our fly ins and camping trips I can get inside my own head. I am most definitely a Nervous Nellie Many have commented in other threads about pacing one self or making sure you take it all in One of my inspirations came from this forum - the idea of taking it all in before making a race of it Newest post is up - how to maximize your enjoyment when you finally arrive at your destinationhttps://www.northernjacks.com/post/maximize-it Cheers Andrew
You do an excellent job with the blog entries.
Thanks for the feedback - very nice to hear

At times I still get caught up in the numbers, however, of late I take time to sit on the lake let the wind blow me wherever and watch the clouds and wildlife and enjoy the serenity of it all. Your blog does a nice job of reminding folks to do just that.
